info.task: navigate backwards to a switch in the on state
info.title: Navigate backwards to a switch in the on state in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the switch, and sets the switch state to 'on'

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.
